snippet.title: World of Legends - Trailer - ENG
snippet.description:
Join thousands of players across the globe and enjoy the Open-World MMORPG that you never knew you needed. Explore the fantastical world of Elysia in search of worthy opponents, complete compelling quests, and be a Legend. 

Join our official Discord: http://bit.ly/2zjWXdR

***

GAME FEATURES:


★ UNIQUE STRATEGY ★

Recruit and train individual sidekicks, mix and match them up to create the strongest team. Pair them up with specific spells to form epic combinations to unleash your Legend’s full potential!

★ OPEN WORLD ★

Meet other Legends and unearth more of Elysia’s secrets through a non-linear narrative. Explore different zones in real-time with your friends. 

★ PLAY WITH FRIENDS ★

Join forces with your friends to form the strongest Guild in the Kingdom. Unlock exclusive rewards by completing special quests and bring your Guild to greater heights. 

★ BE THE BEST ★

Put your skills to the test and clash against other players from all across the globe in real-time. Defeat dastardly bosses and get your hands on epic loot to stand out from the other commoners.

▒▒ Notes ▒▒

World of Legends is completely free to download and play, but some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. A network connection is also required.

Be a Legend with us!

Facebook: https://fb.com/WorldofLegendsGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WorldofLegendsM
Email: contact@mightybeargames.com
